title: How many features should a luxury car have? - Quora

response.answer_text: Your question could be asking one of two things so I’ll answer it both ways.. First of all, nothing. There shouldn't be any ‘standard’ features on a luxury car. The very thing that makes them luxurious is that they are different from most other cars on the market and much better for it in their own right. I mean, do you buy a rolls (designed around the rear seat experience, because you expect to be chauffeured) or a Bentley (designed around the drivers experience)? Secondly I’d perceive your question to ask what I’d expect to find on any luxury car, that’s just expected or it wouldnt be luxurious without it. That varies from person to person.. That’d be for me; A big engine with plenty of torqueA sleek exteriorLeather interiorA proper clock on the dashLots of legroomDual Climate controlHeated seats front and backAs up to date as possible stereo systemCupholdersCigar Lighters all roundReversing cameraParking Sensors front and back
